DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Steering Committee Review Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the document was reviewed by the Steering Committee.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Steering Committee Review
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to a writing that contains research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research and evaluated or analyzed by a committee that arranges the priorities or order of business for an organization.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.

Property.preferredDefinition: A committee to arrange the priorities or order of business for an organization.:The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

Concepts.definition: A committee to arrange the priorities or order of business for an organization.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
